body_html:
I think we're only seeing this on chroot environments because they're missing CUDA drivers (the linker complains about a missing libcuda.so).

I think the following is a better solution than LD_LIBRARY_PATH:

echo "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda-8.0-stubs.conf
ldconfig

body:
I think we're only seeing this on chroot environments because they're missing CUDA drivers (the linker complains about a missing `libcuda.so`).

I think the following is a better solution than `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`:

```
echo "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda-8.0-stubs.conf
ldconfig
```
